You can get the pose of a tag from the april tag field layout in the swerve subsytem

Optional tagPoseOpt3d = aprilTagFieldLayout.getTagPose(closesttag);
if (tagPoseOpt3d.isPresent())
tagPose2d = tagPoseOpt3d.get().toPose2d();

Then apply whatever offsets you want to get a final pose by setting up a Transform2d and then tagPose2d.transformBy(your Transform2d)

Need to see your code. Did you remove all the
if (closest_tag == 7){
driverXbox.leftTrigger().whileTrue(driveToPose(new Pose2d(new Translation2d(14.380, 3.852), Rotation2d.fromDegrees(180))));
driverXbox.rightTrigger().whileTrue(driveToPose(new Pose2d(new Translation2d(14.395, 4.168), Rotation2d.fromDegrees(180))));}
else if (closest_tag == 8){
driverXbox.leftTrigger().whileTrue(driveToPose(new Pose2d(new Translation2d(13.869, 5.099), Rotation2d.fromDegrees(-120))));
driverXbox.rightTrigger().whileTrue(driveToPose(new Pose2d(new Translation2d(13.583, 5.265), Rotation2d.fromDegrees(-120))));}
else if (closest_tag == 9){
and replace them with one calculated pose from the current tag?

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-03-06T22:59:48.325Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":57,"readers_count":56,"score":21.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":494430,"topic_slug":"fixing-robot-loop-overrun-that-is-causing-issues-with-our-auto-aline","display_username":"Landon","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":53962,"username":"Lfehr","name":"Landon","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/l/47e85d/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53962,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/fixing-robot-loop-overrun-that-is-causing-issues-with-our-auto-aline/494430/7","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3549937,"name":"icemannie","username":"icemannie","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/bc79bd/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-06T23:20:53.473Z","cooked":"

The values you have in code are not the same as the tag pose so you must be offsetting them xoffset, yoffset, angleoffset.

Get the nearest tag pose from the field layout.
Transform2d tr2d= new Transform2d(xoffset, yoffset,
new Rotation2d(Units.degreesToRadians(angle offset)));

Pose2d targetPose = tagpose2d.transformBy(tr2d);
Then driveToPose(targetPose) covers all tags

You should be running gamepad operations out of Robot Container, not out of the Swerve Subsystem periodic.
driveToPose is also running in SwerveSubsystem periodic.
It only gets 20ms to run and should only have the odometry and vision updates.

In RobotContainer it could look something like

drivebase.driverXbox.leftTrigger()
.onTrue(
Commands.defer(() → Commands.runOnce(() → drivebase.findClosestAprilTag()),
Set.of(drivebase)))
.whileTrue(Commands.defer(() →
drivebase.driveToPose(drivebase.reefFinalPose),
Set.of(drivebase)));
findClosestAprilTag and subsequent code would put its result into a Pose2d reefFinalPose
